text: Zhekov () is a Bulgarian masculine surname, its feminine counterpart is Zhekova. It may refer to *Aleksandra Zhekova (born 1987), Bulgarian snowboarder *Andrey Zhekov, Bulgarian volleyball player *Nikola Zhekov (1864–1949), Bulgarian statesman *Petar Zhekov (born 1944), Bulgarian football player *Slavi Zhekov (born 1976), Bulgarian football player *Stanislav Zhekov (born 1980), Bulgarian football player Category:Bulgarian-language surnames
title: Zhekov
